comments.body: We already talked about this workaround.  Nice.  :-)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +476,480 @@  # Here, we add an explicit link instruction according to the workaround posted here:
  # https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gcc-5/+bug/1568899
  target_link_libraries(RooFitCore PRIVATE -lgcc_s -lgcc)
endif()
